abstract: American geologist Xue Feng, who was imprisoned in China for over seven years on charges of illegally procuring state secrets, is deported and returns home to Houston.
lead_paragraph: Xue Feng, an American geologist imprisoned for more than seven years has been deported by China and has arrived home in Houston, a human rights organization said.

headline.main: China Deports American Jailed on Spy Charges
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Detained for Years on Spy Charges, an American Is Released and Deported

snippet: Xue Feng, an American geologist imprisoned for more than seven years has been deported by China and has arrived home in Houston, a human rights organization said.
